channel.title: Posts on Kiran Siddeshwar

item.title: Hi there!
item.description: I. Who am I? Greetings! My name is Kiran Siddeshwar, and this will be my portal to share my projects with the world! I dedicate this page to speak a little bit about myself, and share some insight into my ideas and work. I was born and raised in Bangalore, India, a place well recognised by the whole world as “The Silicon Valley of India”. Having graduated with a Bachelors' in Mechanical Engineering from one of the best private institutes in the country: BMS College of Engineering, I ended up working in Mercedes-Benz R&D India.
